meta.title: Mrunal Munjamkar | Software Engineer
meta.description: Portfolio website showcasing full-stack development work and technical expertise

about.bio: Software Engineer focused on creating secure, scalable, and user-centric applications. Experienced in modern web frameworks and backend technologies, with strong skills in SQL tuning, API design, and AWS cloud infrastructure. I thrive in Agile teams, enjoy solving complex problems, and am committed to continuous learning and innovation.
focus: Building scalable full-stack applications with modern frameworks
Optimizing SQL queries and database performance for large-scale applications
Implementing secure, performant features in Agile development environments

experience.title: Technical Analyst
experience.description: Led end-to-end project delivery, from designing front-end interfaces with Vue.js and Quasar to implementing backend services with Python and optimizing SQL queries, ensuring efficient data retrieval and processing for large-scale applications.
achievements: Configured and managed AWS EC2 instances for hosting internal dashboards and backend services
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define requirements, successfully delivering tailored solutions for clients
Delivered secure, performant features in an Agile team environment

experience.title: Web Developer Intern
experience.description: Built full-stack modules with React, Node, Express, PostgreSQL for internal proper management of courses as well as for the users with filters based on requirements like blog, courses, city.
achievements: Developed full-stack features using React, Node, Express, and PostgreSQL to manage courses and users
Implemented dynamic filtering by blog, course type, city, and college
Integrated AWS services and TypeScript for better scalability

experience.title: SQL Developer Intern
experience.description: Wrote optimized SQL queries and supported data pipelines. Utilized SQL queries to efficiently sort and organize project data, enabling streamlined data analysis.
achievements: Wrote optimized SQL queries for production-level data processing
Ensured query performance and indexing for large datasets
Supported data pipeline development and maintenance

AWS Academy Graduate - AWS Academy Cloud Foundations
